name: Sailboat Explorer
description:
Created by Yubs for the Pirate Jam Pre-Jam Skirmish 2020

Inspired by the 13 Bounty Islands! So I created 13 "locations!"

Features:

4 Quests!

Wonderfully convenient HTML format!

A unique but completely unrealistic sailing/wind system!

Cupcake!

Cool Sailor Jig I'm reusing from my old collection of MuseScore compositions I made!

- Song is SailorJig (created by Yubs earlier)

-Art and Programming (created by Yubs as well!)

Let me know what you think about the game/experimental project! Leave me a comment below!
